title: Plain Dosa
content:
Prepare Dosa Batter: Dosa Batter/ South Indian pancake Batter How to make plain dosa:
  • Keep tawa on medium heat
  • Sprinkle water on it. To check tawa heated or not
  • Remove water with paper towel or onion
  • Take one full medium sized ladle batter and pour at center of the tawa
  • Spread it in circular motion
  • Apply oil around dosa
  • Flip Dosa when the color changes
  • Cook both sides
